reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is an incredible professor! Her lectures are engaging and insightful. Highly recommend her classes.

reviews.subject: Quantum Physics
reviews.review: Challenging course, but Dr. Johnson makes complex topics understandable. Exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: World History
reviews.review: Decent professor, but the lectures can be a bit dry. Requires a lot of reading.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Not the best teaching style. Material is difficult and not well explained.

reviews.subject: Sociology 101
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson is amazing! Her passion for sociology is contagious. Learned a lot in her class.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is very knowledgeable, but the pace is fast. Be prepared to work hard.

reviews.subject: American Literature
reviews.review: Interesting course, but the professor can be a bit strict with grading.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Great professor! Makes economics fun and easy to understand. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Prof. Lee is very knowledgeable and passionate about art. Enjoyed the class.

reviews.subject: Computer Science 101
reviews.review: The material is difficult, and Dr. Clark's lectures are hard to follow.

reviews.subject: Philosophy of Ethics
reviews.review: One of the best professors I've had. Thought-provoking lectures and great discussions.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Solid professor, but the material is dense. Requires a lot of outside study.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Prof. Hall is very encouraging and provides great feedback on writing assignments.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: Dr. Allen knows his stuff, but the course is very challenging. Labs are tough.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Marketing
reviews.review: Very practical course with real-world applications. Prof. Young is engaging.

reviews.subject: Biochemistry
reviews.review: Excellent professor! Makes difficult concepts easy to grasp. Highly recommend.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: The professor is knowledgeable, but the lectures can be a bit dry.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. Harris is a good teacher. The course is challenging but manageable.

reviews.subject: Modern European History
reviews.review: Prof. Scott is passionate about history and it shows in her lectures. Great class!

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Interesting course with a lot of hands-on learning. Dr. Adams is very knowledgeable.
